00029 
00030 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031 
00032 class SpGlslVertexProgram;

00035 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 class SpGlslManager
00039 {
00040 
00042 public:
00043     ~SpGlslManager();
00044 
00046 public:
00047 
00048     //: Returns true if the program is successfully compiled
00049     static bool compile(SpGpuProgram* pkSpGpuProgram);
00050 
00051     //: Returns true if the program is successfully bound
00052     static bool bind(SpGpuProgram* pkSpGpuProgram);
00053 
00054     //: Returns true if the program is successfully enabled
00055     static bool enable( SpGpuProgram* pkSpGpuProgram );
00056 
00057     //: Returns true if the program is successfully disabled
00058     static bool disable( SpGpuProgram* pkSpGpuProgram );
00059 
00060     //: Returns true if the program is successfully destroyed
00061     static bool release(SpGpuProgram* pkSpGpuProgram);
00062 
00063     //: Returns true if the program is supported by the loader and the system
00064     static bool isSupported(const SpGpuProgram* pkSpGpuProgram);
00065 
00066     //: Returns NULL if invalid or nonexistant file
00067     static SpGpuProgram* loadFromFile(const char* acFilename, SpGpuProgram::Type);
00068 
00069     //: Returns NULL if invalid or nonexistant file
00070     static SpGlslVertexProgram* loadVertexProgramFromFile(const char* acFilename);
00071 
00072     //: Returns NULL if invalid or nonexistant file
00073     static SpGlslFragmentProgram* loadFragmentProgramFromFile(const char* acFilename);
00074 
00075     //: Outputs detailed error info for a given object
00076     static void printInfoLog(unsigned int uiHandle);
00077 
00078     //: Returns the current resource path used during load
00079     static SpResourcePath& searchpath();
00080 
00081     //: Initializes a minimal fragment program which passes texture data through
00082     static void enableTexturePassThrough(bool bIsRectangle=false);
00083 
00084     //: Initializes a minimal fragment program which passes color data through
00085     static void enableFragmentPassThrough();
00086 
00087     static void enableFragmentPrograms();
00088     static void enableVertexPrograms();
00089     static void disableFragmentPrograms();
00090     static void disableVertexPrograms();
00091 
00092 
00093 
00095 protected:
00096 
00097     //: Search path for loading program data
00098     static SpResourcePath ms_kSpResourcePath;
00099 
00101 protected:
00102 
00103     static SpGpuProgram* ms_apkCurrent[SpGpuProgram::GPU_PROGRAM_COUNT];
00104 
00106 private:
00107 
00108     SpGlslManager();
00109 };
